name: Fast Driving: City Challenge
description:
Become fast and become furious during the race, this will bring you the fortune on the track and worship of the crowds. Participate in the fast race and own the competition by effective speed race. Perform car chase by fast racing on asphalt tracks. If you desperately need for speed, you’ll be satisfied by features found in Fast Driving: City Challenge

FEATURING:
- Amazing city to investigate.
- Gather changes on the track.
- Exciting profession mode.
- Make your own Car outline.
- Drive like a racer by using turbo.
